name: Orb Quest
description:
Orb Quest was made for the BPT game jam 3 by a single person in about a week.

The theme was less is more.

In my game, the less lives you have; the faster you are.

In my opinion, this gives a kind of Risk-Reward bonus to the game.

Instructions are in game.

RATING IS GREATLY APRECIADED

Play my other games HERE

Scratch Profile

Version 1.1 Updates:

- UI fixing

-Fixes in the level.

Have fun!
